description:
Since Gin-san was the White Yaksha, a major player in the Joi war, Hijikata orders a stakeout on Odd Jobs in order to find out if he`s still connected to the Joi rebels. This stakeout mission lands at the feet of Inspector Yamazaki Sagaru.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Inspector`s Love Begins with an Inspection
Kansatsu no Koi wa Kansatsu kara Hajimaru
L`amour d`un inspecteur commence par l`observation
監察の恋は観察から始まる
